channel.title: Home Automation on Adventures Unknown

item.title: Control4 the Garage Door
item.description: When we first moved into our house, the home builder installed a set of Chamberlain myQ enabled smart garage door openers. I was excited about the possibility of being able to use my phone to make sure that our doors were closed when we were away, or to be notified if they opened when they shouldn’t.
